title: Cumberland Island National Seashore: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids       Take a moment and learn how your kids can have fun while educating themselves in the island's vast history and culture.  Junior Rangers  An activity booklet for ages 5-12 can be picked up from a Ranger at either the Mainland Visitor Center, Sea Camp Ranger Station or Dungeness Dockhouse. Present the completed activity book to a Park Ranger to earn a Jr. Ranger badge and a badge.   Educational Programs  A variety of educational programs are available for elementary, middle and high school students. Call 912-882-4336 ext. 257 or email us at CUIS_Info@nps.gov to arrange a program. You will need to already have ferry reservations before scheduling a school program. Web Rangers  WEBRANGER - Be a Junior Ranger even if you are not able to visit a National Park. Log in and join the fun. Activities change from time to time. Click here to begin.
